scripts.bootstrap: yarn && node init.js && lerna clean && yarn && lerna bootstrap
scripts.build:client: lerna run build:ssr --scope=client && lerna run build --scope=client
scripts.dev:server: yarn build:client && cp -r packages/client/public packages/server/dist && cp -r packages/client/dist/client/assets packages/server/dist && lerna run dev --scope=server
scripts.precommit: yarn format && yarn lint && yarn test
